abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this Ability. Choose 1 of your Basic Pokémon in play. If you have a Stage 2 card in your hand that evolves from that Pokémon, put that card onto the Basic Pokémon to evolve it. You can use this Ability during your first turn or on a Pokémon that was put into play this turn.

attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Confused. If tails, your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Wonder Ray
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokémon by any Pokémon that has an Ability.

abilities.name: Path of Life
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, when this Pokémon moves from your Bench to become your Active Pokémon, you may move any number of Energy from your other Pokémon to it.

attacks.name: Bright Horns
attacks.effect: This Pokémon can’t use Bright Horns during your next turn.

attacks.name: Sweet Scent
attacks.effect: Heal 30 damage from 1 of your Pokémon.

abilities.name: Mysterious Buzz
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, whenever your opponent plays a Supporter card from their hand, prevent all effects of that card done to your Fairy Pokémon in play.

attacks.name: Perplex
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Confused.

abilities.name: Effect Spore
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent’s attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), the Attacking Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Dream’s Touch
attacks.effect: If your opponent’s Active Pokémon is Asleep, your opponent shuffles all Energy from it into their deck.

attacks.name: Perplex
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Let’s Snuggle & Fall
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 more damage for each damage counter on your opponent’s Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dream Fear GX
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. Your opponent shuffles that Pokémon and all cards attached to it into their deck. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

abilities.name: Charmed Charm
abilities.effect: Whenever you attach a Pokémon Tool card that has "Fairy Charm" in its name from your hand to this Pokémon during your turn, you may leave your opponent’s Active Pokémon Confused.

attacks.name: Dream Away
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent shuffles their Active Pokémon and all cards attached to it into their deck.

attacks.name: Wonder Shine
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Healing Pirouette
attacks.effect: Heal 20 damage from each of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Sympathetic Slap
attacks.effect: If your opponent’s Active Pokémon already has any damage counters on it before this attack does damage, this attack does nothing.

abilities.name: Happiness Supplement
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may remove a Special Condition from your Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Powerful Slap
attacks.effect: Flip a coin for each Energy attached to this Pokémon. This attack does 80 damage for each heads.

abilities.name: Almighty Evolution
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put any Stage 1 card from your hand onto this Pokémon to evolve it. You can’t use this Ability during your first turn or the turn this Pokémon was put into play.

attacks.name: Mystifying Horns
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Enhanced Horns
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool card attached to it, this attack does 60 more damage.

attacks.name: Stunning Likeness
attacks.effect: Your opponent reveals their hand. You may use the effect of a Supporter card you find there as the effect of this attack.

attacks.name: Tail Smash
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Milk Cannon
attacks.effect: Reveal any number of Moomoo Milk cards in your hand. This attack does 60 damage for each card you revealed in this way.

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 more damage times the amount of Energy attached to your opponent’s Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Pelagic Blade
attacks.effect: This Pokémon can’t use Pelagic Blade during your next turn.

attacks.name: Lost Purge GX
attacks.effect: Put your opponent’s Active Pokémon and all cards attached to it in the Lost Zone. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Rainbow Burn
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 more damage for each type of basic Energy attached to this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Unit Color 1
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon has Unit Energy GrassFireWater attached to it, it is a Grass, Fire, and Water Pokémon.

attacks.name: Tongue Smack
attacks.effect: If your opponent’s Active Pokémon is an Evolution Pokémon, this attack does 50 more damage.

abilities.name: Unit Color 3
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon has Unit Energy FightingDarknessFairy attached to it, it is a Fighting, Darkness, and Fairy Pokémon.

attacks.name: Peck Off
attacks.effect: Before doing damage, discard all Pokémon Tool cards from your opponent’s Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Send Back
attacks.effect: Your opponent switches their Active Pokémon with 1 of their Benched Pokémon.

abilities.name: Mountain Pass
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is in your hand, you may reveal it. If you do, look at the top card of your opponent’s deck and put this Pokémon in the Lost Zone. If that card is a Supporter card, you may put it in the Lost Zone. If your opponent has no cards in their deck, you can’t use this Ability.

attacks.name: Heat Beak
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Giganticannon
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon evolved during this turn, this attack does nothing.

cards.name: Adventure Bag
cards.effect: Search your deck for up to 2 Pokémon Tool cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Aether Foundation Employee
cards.effect: Put 3 Pokémon that have "Alolan" in their names from your discard pile into your hand.

cards.name: Choice Helmet
cards.effect: The Pokémon this card is attached to takes 30 less damage from the attacks of your opponent’s Pokémon-GX and Pokémon-EX (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

cards.name: Counter Gain
cards.effect: If you have more Prize cards remaining than your opponent, the attacks of the Pokémon this card is attached to cost Colorless less.

cards.name: Custom Catcher
cards.effect:
You may play 2 Custom Catcher cards at once.

• If you played 1 card, draw cards until you have 3 cards in your hand.
• If you played 2 cards, switch 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon with their Active Pokémon. (This effect works one time for 2 cards.)

cards.name: Electropower
cards.effect: During this turn, your Lightning Pokémon’s attacks do 30 more damage to your opponent’s Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

cards.name: Faba
cards.effect: Choose a Pokémon Tool or Special Energy card attached to 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon, or any Stadium card in play, and put it in the Lost Zone.

cards.name: Fairy Charm Grass
cards.effect: Prevent all damage done to the Fairy Pokémon this card is attached to by attacks from your opponent’s Grass Pokémon-GX and Grass Pokémon-EX.

cards.name: Fairy Charm Psychic
cards.effect: Prevent all damage done to the Fairy Pokémon this card is attached to by attacks from your opponent’s Psychic Pokémon-GX and Psychic Pokémon-EX.

cards.name: Fairy Charm Fighting
cards.effect: Prevent all damage done to the Fairy Pokémon this card is attached to by attacks from your opponent’s Fighting Pokémon-GX and Fighting Pokémon-EX.

cards.name: Fairy Charm Dragon
cards.effect: Prevent all damage done to the Fairy Pokémon this card is attached to by attacks from your opponent’s Dragon Pokémon-GX and Dragon Pokémon-EX.

cards.name: Heat Factory ◇
cards.effect:
Once during each player’s turn, that player may discard a Fire Energy card from their hand. If they do, they draw 3 cards.

Whenever any player plays an Item or Supporter card from their hand, prevent all effects of that card done to this Stadium card.

cards.name: Kahili
cards.effect: Draw 2 cards. Then, flip a coin. If heads, if you played this Kahili from your hand, put this card into your hand instead of the discard pile. If you have no cards in your deck, you can’t play this card.

cards.name: Life Forest ◇
cards.effect:
Once during each player’s turn, that player may heal 60 damage and remove all Special Conditions from 1 of their Grass Pokémon.

Whenever any player plays an Item or Supporter card from their hand, prevent all effects of that card done to this Stadium card.

cards.name: Lost Blender
cards.effect: Put 2 cards from your hand in the Lost Zone. If you do, draw a card.

cards.name: Lusamine ◇
cards.effect:
You can play this card only if your opponent has exactly 3 Prize cards remaining.

Prevent all damage done to your Ultra Beasts by attacks during your opponent’s next turn.

cards.name: Mina
cards.effect: Search your deck for a Fairy Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Mixed Herbs
cards.effect:
You may play 2 Mixed Herbs cards at once.

• If you played 1 card, remove a Special Condition from your Active Pokémon.
• If you played 2 cards, heal 90 damage and remove all Special Conditions from your Active Pokémon. (This effect works one time for 2 cards.)

cards.name: Moomoo Milk
cards.effect: Choose 1 of your Pokémon, and then flip 2 coins. For each heads, heal 30 damage from that Pokémon.

cards.name: Morty
cards.effect:
You can play this card only if 1 of your Psychic Pokémon was Knocked Out during your opponent’s last turn.

Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose 2 cards you find there. Your opponent shuffles those cards into their deck.

cards.name: Net Ball
cards.effect: Search your deck for a Basic Grass Pokémon or a Grass Energy card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Professor Elm’s Lecture
cards.effect: Search your deck for up to 3 Pokémon with 60 HP or less, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Sightseer
cards.effect: You may discard any number of cards from your hand. Then, draw cards until you have 5 cards in your hand. If you can’t draw any cards in this way, you can’t play this card.

cards.name: Spell Tag
cards.effect: When the Psychic Pokémon this card is attached to is Knocked Out by damage from an opponent’s attack, put 4 damage counters on your opponent’s Pokémon in any way you like.

cards.name: Thunder Mountain ◇
cards.effect:
The attacks of Lightning Pokémon (both yours and your opponent’s) cost Lightning less.

Whenever any player plays an Item or Supporter card from their hand, prevent all effects of that card done to this Stadium card.

cards.name: Wait and See Hammer
cards.effect:
You can use this card only if you go second, and only on your first turn. 

Discard an Energy from 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon.

cards.name: Whitney
cards.effect: Draw a card. Then, draw 2 cards for each other Whitney in your discard pile.

abilities.name: Protective Shell
abilities.effect: Prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from your opponent’s Pokémon that have 2 or fewer Energy attached to them.

attacks.name: Triple Poison
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Poisoned. Put 3 damage counters instead of 1 on that Pokémon between turns.

attacks.name: Wrap GX
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Mach Cut
attacks.effect: Discard a Special Energy from your opponent’s Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Leaf Cyclone
attacks.effect: Move a Grass Energy from this Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Jungle Heal GX
attacks.effect: Heal all damage from each of your Pokémon that has any Grass Energy attached to it. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Double Draw
attacks.effect: Draw 2 cards.

attacks.name: Sensitive Blade
attacks.effect: If you played a Supporter card from your hand during this turn, this attack does 80 more damage.

attacks.name: Breeze Away GX
attacks.effect: Put any number of your Pokémon in play and all cards attached to them into your hand. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

abilities.name: Crushing Charge
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard the top card of your deck. If it’s a basic Energy card, attach it to 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Lava Flow
attacks.effect: Discard any amount of basic Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 50 more damage for each card you discarded in this way.

attacks.name: Burning Magma GX
attacks.effect: Discard the top 5 cards of your opponent’s deck. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Bursting Burn
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Burned and Confused.

attacks.name: Mind Blown
attacks.effect: Put any amount of Fire Energy attached to your Pokémon in the Lost Zone. This attack does 50 damage for each card put in the Lost Zone in this way.

attacks.name: Burst GX
attacks.effect: Discard 1 of your Prize cards. If it’s an Energy card, attach it to 1 of your Pokémon. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

abilities.name: Phantom Winds
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is on your Bench, you may shuffle it and all cards attached to it into your deck.

attacks.name: Cure Stream
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, the Defending Pokémon’s attacks do 30 less damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Brinicles GX
attacks.effect: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

abilities.name: Thunderclap Zone
abilities.effect: Each of your Pokémon that has any Lightning Energy attached to it has no Retreat Cost.

attacks.name: Plasma Fists
attacks.effect: This Pokémon can’t attack during your next turn.

attacks.name: Full Voltage GX
attacks.effect: Attach 5 basic Energy cards from your discard pile to your Pokémon in any way you like. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

abilities.name: Mirror Counter
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an attack from your opponent’s Pokémon-GX or Pokémon-EX (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), put damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon equal to the damage done to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Sonic Wing
attacks.effect: This attack’s damage isn’t affected by Resistance.

attacks.name: Intercept GX
attacks.effect: This attack does 60 damage times the amount of Energy attached to your opponent’s Active Pokémon. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

abilities.name: Lost Out
abilities.effect: If your opponent’s Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from this Pokémon’s attacks, put that Pokémon and all cards attached to it in the Lost Zone instead of the discard pile.

attacks.name: Dusty Ruckus
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage to each of your opponent’s Benched Basic Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Lay the Smackdown GX
attacks.effect: This attack’s damage isn’t affected by any effects on your opponent’s Active Pokémon. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

abilities.name: Double Drive
abilities.effect: This Pokémon may have up to 2 Pokémon Tool cards attached to it. If it loses this Ability, discard Pokémon Tool cards from it until only 1 remains.

attacks.name: Break Buster GX
attacks.effect: This attack’s damage isn’t affected by Resistance. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

abilities.name: Mysterious Guidance
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may search your deck for up to 2 Item cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Snowy Wind
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Sublimation GX
attacks.effect: If your opponent’s Active Pokémon is an Ultra Beast, it is Knocked Out. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.effect: This attack does 30 more damage for each damage counter on your opponent’s Active Pokémon.

attacks.effect: This attack does 30 more damage times the amount of Energy attached to your opponent’s Active Pokémon.

attacks.effect: This Pokémon can’t use Pelagic Blade during your next turn.

attacks.name: Lost Purge GX
attacks.effect: Put your opponent’s Active Pokémon and all cards attached to it in the Lost Zone. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

cards.effect: Each player shuffles their hand into their deck and draws 4 cards.
